artist: Artist: Jim Albertson; Artist: Andy Baird; Artist: Lisa Brooks; Artist: Robert Corbit; Artist: James DeWitt; Artist: Carol Gaard; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: David Johnson; Artist: Peter Martin; Artist: Joe McDonnell; Artist: William McKearn; Artist: Greg Miller; Artist: Ed Rath; Artist: Janet Richard; Artist: Jean Ross; Artist: M. Louise Stanley; Artist: Fritz Wolfmeyer; Artist: William Wormley; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 12 pages; saddle stapled; 2 color printed cover which features a bright yellow sunburst with '"Artpolice Comics" lettered inside lightning bolt; large hands holding sunburst; near PR hand is an emblem which says "Compliments of Minnesota Artists Exhibition Program"; the two color printed covers are inside a brown paper mailer
inscription: handwritten letters on front of brown paper mailer: (illeg.)
provenance: MIA Art Reference and Research Library; transfered to MIA, 2015.
title: Artpolice Comics, Vol. 3, No. 1: "Minnesota Artists Exhibition Program Issue"
